Title: Senior Java Developer - great opportunity to work on innovative software
Company Description:
Company Overview

Scapa Technologies Limited specializes in the development of solutions to ensure the performance of large-scale commercial software systems. Scapa Technologies provides IT risk management software tools and professional services to growing, information-rich organizations.


Specialising in testing and verifying applications delivered on Thin Client, VDI and Remedy Action Request System. Providing end to end testing and monitoring.

 

More on our tools and company can be found at www.scapatech.com
Job Description:
Scapa Technologies are seeking to recruit an experienced Java Developer. The role will allow you to use your experience to work independently on improving and developing our flagship our load testing software, Scapa TPP.

 

Scapa TPP is a load testing tool used by many leading organisations around the world to test and benchmark line of business applications on various platforms such as Citrix, VMWare View, MS RDP and BMC Remedy.

The core development skills we require are Java, Eclipse, C, and web services. You will have some experience of UI design and implementation. Ideally you will have experience with, or knowledge of, our target technologies, but this is not essential.

The position can be home-based, but you would be required to attend team meetings in Edinburgh. While working towards product or development objectives you will be granted a fair degree of independence in how those objectives are met, so must be able to demonstrate an ability to work constructively alone, reporting milestones and delivering to deadlines.

We offer a competitive salary, and package including pension, benefits and share options.

Please forward your CV, a cover letter outlining your areas of expertise, and outline salary expectations.
